name: Amazon Odyssey
description: Go on an incredible journey through the Amazon Rainforest inside the comfort of your virtual reality headset. You will parachute into the jungle and make camp, before exploring the river and paragliding over massive cataracts. Take pictures of macaws, alligators, jaguars and more!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
